abstract: Cleveland Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel is under investigation for alleged domestic violence incident involving his former girlfriend Colleen Crowley.
lead_paragraph: Manziel, facing a criminal investigation after allegations that he hit his former girlfriend last weekend, is expected to be released by the Cleveland Browns next month.

headline.main: Johnny Manziel Faces Police Inquiry in Domestic Dispute
headline.print_headline: Manziel Faces Police Inquiry in Domestic Dispute

snippet: Manziel, facing a criminal investigation after allegations that he hit his former girlfriend last weekend, is expected to be released by the Cleveland Browns next month.
